Regulation Name(s): Cystic fibrosis transmembrane conductance regulator (CFTR) gene mutation detection system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for InPlex CF Molecular Test for simultaneous detection and identification of ACMG/ACOG-recommended CFTR gene mutations using microfluidic card technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro qualitative genotyping of CFTR gene mutations in genomic DNA from human peripheral whole blood to aid carrier screening for adults of reproductive age, assist in newborn screening, and confirmatory testing in newborns and children; not for fetal or pre-implantation testing or stand-alone diagnostics.
